item.title: The AI Bubble Paradox: Why OpenAI's $500 Billion Valuation Proves The Opposite
item.description: Sam Altman warns of an AI bubble even as OpenAI nears a $500B valuation—signaling short-term froth but long-term infrastructure revolution.

item.title: ‘Peacemaker’ Season 2 Release Schedule: When Do New Episodes Come Out?
item.description: James Gunn and John Cena’s hit series "Peacemaker" is back with Season 2 after a three-year break. When will the new episodes be released?

item.title: IEEE Returned To The 2025 World Science Fiction Convention
item.description: IEEE participated in the 2025 World Science Fiction Convention. We organized sessions and had an exhibit that featured some historical artifacts.
